content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) used for smelting iron ore into iron-plate.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) used for smelting copper ore into copper-plate.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) with lab input {'automation-science-pack': 10}, status NO_POWER, research set to automation, electrical_id updated to 24420.
- ElectricityGroup (id 24420) connecting small electric poles at positions (8.5, 6.5), (10.5, 7.5), and (9.5, 6.5) with voltage 0.

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(-10.5, 18.5)
Consists of:
- Generator (steam engine) at position(-10.5, 18.5) used for producing electricity; warnings: "not connected to power network", "no input liquid", "no fluid present in connections"; status NOT_CONNECTED; connection points at positions (-10.5, 16.0) and (-10.5, 21.0).
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) used for heating water; status NO_FUEL with warning "out of fuel"; connection points at positions (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5); linked to fluid_system 119731; steam_output_point at (-7.5, 24.5).
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) used for water intake; status WORKING; connection point at (-9.5, 23.5); linked to fluid_system 119731.
- Wooden chest at position(-4.5, 25.5) serving as the manual fuel feeding system.
- Pipeline Network consisting of:
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 119731 at position(-5.5, 19.5) – status WORKING.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 119730 at position(-2.5, 19.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 119743 at position(5.5, 21.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 119742 at position(1.5, 23.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 119738 at position(-7.5, 25.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 119747 at position(0.5, 24.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 119746 at position(1.5, 25.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 119749 at position(1.5, 27.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 119750 at position(4.5, 27.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 119751 at position(-0.5, 28.5) – status EMPTY.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
• Pipe Group Connection Failures:
  - Multiple connection attempts using candidate pipe groups with fluid_system identifiers [118403, 118487, 118569, 118653, 118735, 118819, 118901, 118985] from earlier steps and [119067, 119151, 119233, 119317, 119399, 119483, 119565, 119649] in recent attempts returned no candidates within a 15-unit radius at position (-5.5, 19.5).
  - Tip: Use the updated fluid_system identifier (119731) from the active pipeline network configuration to ensure successful connection.

• Inconsistent Fluid System Reference:
  - Outdated fluid_system identifiers have been repeatedly used during connection attempts, leading to failures.
  - Tip: Validate and update fluid_system references prior to initiating connection attempts to align with the current network state.
